data.name: Kill King Demo
data.detailed_description:
Chess re-invented. This is real auto-chess!

Each move you will make in advance and in the process observe your ingenious decisions, or as luck would have it.

  • Anticipate your opponent's moves and make a *GOW (extra critical damage).
  • Avoid enemy ranged attacks, use magic, level up (unlock new abilities and change your chessman behaviour).
  • Each game is unique, with more possible combinations than there are stars in the universe!

Choose wisely, keep beating your opponents and become the strongest. The only question is... which side are you on?

The battle may take ~15 minutes.
*GOW - God of War!
data.about_the_game:
Chess re-invented. This is real auto-chess!

Each move you will make in advance and in the process observe your ingenious decisions, or as luck would have it.

Choose wisely, keep beating your opponents and become the strongest. The only question is... which side are you on?

*GOW - God of War!
data.short_description: Chess, but with the use of magic and long-range combat and RPG elements. Dive into the world of turn-based strategy, control several warriors at once and predict your opponent's moves! A unique strategy based on the age-old classics of the chess board.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, French, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 19 MB available space

developers: Small team, this game is our hobby.
